item.description:
http://lowell.org/Pages/WinterfestActivities.aspx

Parking is available at Lowell Historical Park Parking Lot, off Dutton Street, Lowell, MA 01852 or at

parking garage.  Street parking if you're lucky!  Please see website for additional activities besides the ones listed below. 

6PM - 9PM  | Hot Roasted Marshmallows
Sponsored by the Lowell Rotary Club. Donation: $3 per stick. Location: Arcand Drive


6:30PM  |  2013 Lowell WinterFest Opening Ceremonies
Kick off the 13th Annual Lowell WinterFest at the Official Opening Ceremonies with a live performance of our National Anthem, the first-ever Crowning of WinterFest's King & Queen, and a dynamic live Fire Hoop/Fire Dance Performance by Hydra! Location: Trinity EMS Dogsled Track, Arcand Drive

* 6:30PM - 12AM  |  Polar Party @ Club Celsius - LIVE MUSIC!
21+ only, $5 cover charge
Warm up with food, beverages and great live music in WinterFest's giant heated tent -- the place to be! Location: Arcand Drive
Friday Live Music Schedule at Club Celsius
7pm - 12 midnight / Evan Goodrow Band

7:15PM & 7:45PM  |  LIVE Firedance Performances by Hydra - TWO SHOWS!
Local firedance troupe Hydra brings their dynamic show to WinterFest -- enjoy their performances AND see how it's all done with interactive audience demonstrations! Location: JKF Plaza near City Hall


7PM - 9PM  |  North Bowl Soup Competition  - Day 1
Sponsored by Lowell General Hospital. Fourteen of the area’s finest chefs, restaurants and caterers compete for two top prizes: People’s Choice and the Juried Prize. Admission: $5/pp, tickets available at the door. Location: Masonic Center, 79 Dutton Street
item.how_to_find_us: JFK Plaza, Arcand Drive, Lowell, MA 01852. Outside of Tent, near Dog Sled track at 6:15pm, or following opening ceremony, inside "Club Celsius" Tent. I'll have "Meetup" pin.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Lowell Winterfest 2013
